entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 01:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
